  • Method Details

    • confirmation

      public static boolean confirmation(Alerts.ConfirmType confirmType)
      Creates an alert display for the user to verify whether they want to proceed with their choice.
      Parameters:
      confirmType - Gives user prompt to confirm choice.
      Returns:
      boolean.

    • customConfirmation

      public static boolean customConfirmation(String title, String message)
      Creates a custom alert display for the user to verify whether they want to proceed with their choice.
      Parameters:
      title - Title of the alert.
      message - The message the user sees.
      Returns:
      Confirmation that the ok button was pressed by the user which exits the alert screen.

    • error

      public static void error(String errorMessage)
      Alerts the user if there is an error display.
      Parameters:
      errorMessage - Displays a message to user that an error as occurred.

    • information

      public static void information(String infoMessage)
      Alerts the user with an instructional information display.
      Parameters:
      infoMessage - Instructs the user with information.
